body.name: Head & Shoulders Supreme Sulfate Free Shampoo and Conditioner Set for Dry Scalp and Dandruff Treatment, Soothe and Strengthen with Argan Oil and Rose Essence, 21.2 Fl Oz
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 23 hrs 7 mins
features: Clinically Proven. Up to 100% Dandruff Protection*. (*visible flakes, with regular use)
Head & Shoulders Soothe & Strengthen Shampoo and Conditioner control frizz for up to 24 hours
Soothe & Strengthen Shampoo and Conditioner have the vibrant scent of fresh fruit and elegant florals
pH BALANCED: pH balanced to be gentle enough for everyday use
PARABEN FREE: Head & Shoulders Soothe & Strengthen Daily Shampoo and Conditioner are paraben free
body.description: Looking for a shampoo and conditioner that leave your hair smooth and up to 100% flake-free*? Look no further than Head & Shoulders Soothe & Strengthen Shampoo and Conditioner. With rich and creamy lather, Head & Shoulders Soothe & Strengthen Shampoo nourishes hair with intense moisture and leaves hair sleek, shining and free of frizz for 24 hours. Plus, Head & Shoulders is the number one anti-dandruff shampoo recommended by dermatologists so you know your hair will be up to 100% flake-free.**visible flakes; with regular useRegular use of Head & Shoulders anti dandruff products nourish your scalp three surface layers deep to prevent dryness, flakes and itch, associated with dandruff. The Head & Shoulders collection includes clarifying shampoos, volumizing conditioners, and 2 in 1 combos, so you can introduce dandruff treatment to every step of your hair care routine. With a pH-balanced formula brought to you by America's #1 dermatologist recommended brand, you can count on Head & Shoulders to combat seborrheic dermatitis, and other irritable and itchy scalp conditions associated with dandruff. Head & Shoulders products come in a variety of scents and formulas, and include ingredients like almond oil, tea tree oil, lemon extract, and peppermint. The shampoo & conditioner system are safe to use on color treated, curly or textured hair types, compared to a non-conditioning shampoo.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sulfate free dandruff shampoo that works!
reviews.reviewText: My scalp was so dry, and Head and Shoulders worked for me, but my hair was used to sulfate free shampoo, so it did not react well to the switch. This is a perfect combo for my scalp and hair. I love the scent. Will buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: After trying many expensive name brands and being disappointed I decided to try this. Wow!! It smells amazing but most importantly it's a thick cream so it actually moisturizes hair and leaves it feeling soft. It smells like rose petals and my frizzy dry hair is doing much better. Love it. Also the bottle is huge, it doesn't take much to cover hair ends

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works well, feels good
reviews.reviewText: I use this product to wash my hair!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this product for the first time to hopefully relieve some scalp issue that was causing hair loss for me. This shampoo was amazing! The first time I put it on it felt like heaven. It leaves no residue and has a pleasant scent

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for 4C Hair!!
reviews.reviewText: I was nervous trying this product because I have coarse, kinky 4c hair that has been bleached and dyed. I’ve been battling with dandruff with the season changes and the prescription cream I’ve been using seemed to just add more build up. Let me tell you, this stuff works!!! I’ve used Head & Shoulders before and ended up with dry, tangled curls, but with this one, even after shampooing twice my hair still felt manageable. I only use the conditioner on my roots/scalp area and a deep conditioner on the rest of my hair, but it did not leave a weird buildup or cause dryness. Definitely recommend, and it smells good too!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This stuff saved my scalp
reviews.reviewText: I love this stuff. Made my head a million times less itchy and less flakey. Can’t recommend enough. And I think it smells amazing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect sulfate free Dandruff Shampoo - Economy size!
reviews.reviewText: This wonderful sulfate free dandruff Head and Shoulders variety of shampoo is impossible to find it stores. I am so thankful that I can find it here! The economy size, multi pack option is just right for my family. This size bottle lasts 2 users about 3-4 months and it does wonders for clearing dandruff almost immediately after a few uses. It's such a great price savings and we are so glad that we aren't having to deal with sulfates while we try to clean our hair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Useless shampoo - do nothing
reviews.reviewText: Im using this shampoo every day for about a month, i see no improvement in dandruff, and maybe even it got worse..Better to buy nitrozol much better result!
